When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar.(n)

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama.(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers).(n)

programme.title: Prophet's Prey
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the shocking life of notorious cult leader Warren Jeffs, and the FLDS Church, who through brainwashing and abuse seized control of his followers' lives and an organization worth hundreds of millions of dollars. While Jeffs is currently serving a life sentence for his crimes, he still exerts total authority over his flock. Features unprecedented interviews with Church insiders and victims, exposing the nightmarish hell of unspeakable crimes that still continue to this day.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute.(n)

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby.(n)

programme.title: Dream House
programme.desc: Daniel Craig and Academy Award winner Rachel Weisz star as a couple that unknowingly moves into a New England home where several grisly murders were committed, only to become the killer's next target. Academy Award nominee Naomi Watts stars as a neighbor who knew the previous family - a family whose gruesome story could be horrific foreshadowing of the present family's demise. Directed by the Academy Award nominee Jim Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: When a train carrying atomic warheads mysteriously crashes in the former Soviet Union, brilliant U.S. nuclear specialist Dr. Julia Kelly (Nicole Kidman) discovers the accident is really part of a diabolical plot to cover up the theft of the weapons. Assigned to help her recover the missing bombs, Special Forces Colonel Thomas Devoe (George Clooney), has a brash, take-no-prisoners style that clashes with Kelly's diplomatic approach. Putting aside their personal differences, the two begin a partnership and try to track down the stolen weapons.(n)

programme.title: Red In Tooth And Claw
programme.desc: Nancy's (MARY-LOUISE PARKER) attempt to raise money for Stevie's soccer fees tempts her back to her old ways as she battles to finally leave the drug business for good. Jill (JENNIFER JASON LEIGH) uses Doug (KEVIN NEALON) to get revenge on Andy (JUSTIN KIRK). Shane (ALEXANDER GOULD) and Angela (DANIELE WATTS) go on a double date with Ouellette (MICHAEL HARNEY) and his wife. Meanwhile, Silas' (HUNTER PARRISH) friendship with R.J. (DOMINIC DIERKES) takes a strange turn.(n)

programme.title: Allosaurus Crush Castle
programme.desc: Nancy (MARY-LOUISE PARKER) is ready to get her life back on track and starts anew with a job search. Jill (JENNIFER JASON LEIGH) drops a bomb on Andy (JUSTIN KIRK) and Doug (KEVIN NEALON). Silas (HUNTER PARRISH) must track down the location of his stolen plants. Meanwhile, Shane (ALEXANDER GOULD) uses his superior intellect to make some extra cash at the police academy.(n)

A negative Internet review leaves Belle with a much-reduced client list, so she follows Ben's advice and takes a little time off - but the break and a one-night stand only leave her missing her work.(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Strong Sexual Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, Charlie Wilson is a womanizing US congressional representative from Texas who is a member of two major foreign policy and covert-ops committees. After being prodded by his major conservative supporter, Houston Socialite Joanne Herring, Wilson learns about the plight the people are suffering in the brutal Soviet occupation of Afghanistan. With the help of maverick CIA agent Gustav Avrakotos, Wilson dedicates his canny political efforts to supply the Afghan mujahideen with the weapons and support to defeat the Soviet Union.(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis.(n)

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.(n)

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs.(n)

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas.(n)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).(n)

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought.(n)

programme.title: Killshot
programme.desc: An innocent couple that crosses paths with a professional assassin is forced into the witness protection program while the resourceful killer hunts them down in this crime thriller starring Diane Lane, Mickey Rourke and Thomas Jane.(n)

programme.title: #ThatsHarassment
programme.desc: This film is a series of six short films, written and directed by Sigal Avin. It depicts six different cases of sexual harassment in the work place, all based on real events. In ‘The Boss,’ a young employee gets a ride home. In ‘The Photographer,’ a young model is put in an uncomfortable position. In ‘The Doctor,’ a patient is taken advantage of. In ‘The Actor,’ a costume dresser is taken aback. In ‘The Politician,’ a journalist is asked to take a break from an interview. In ‘The Co-worker,’ a bartender trains the new girl.(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.(n)

programme.title: French Cancan
programme.desc: A chronicle of the revival of Paris' most notorious dance told through the story of a theater producer who turns a humble washerwoman into a star at the Moulin Rouge.(n)

programme.title: Double Harness
programme.desc: The unmarried daughter in a once-wealthy family tricks the wastrel heir of a once-great shipping company into marriage, but then begins to have second thoughts about the deed and experiences feelings of guilt. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Love-Tails of Morocco
programme.desc: "Dogville" comedy short featuring an all-canine cast in a spoof of French Foreign Legion films. They gather at a local watering hole to lament the women problems that led all of them to join up. Directed by Zion Myers and Jules White.(n)

programme.title: Rafter Romance
programme.desc: A man and woman rent the same room; one uses it during the day, the other during the night and resent each other, until they meet. Based on a novel by John K. Wells. (cc).(n)

programme.title: How to Sublet
programme.desc: Everyman Joe Doakes (Robert Benchley) attempts to explain the best way to sublet an apartment.(n)

programme.title: One Man's Journey
programme.desc: A tireless doctor whose efforts often go unappreciated by his patients and family continues to dedicate his life to medicine, ultimately inspiring his son to follow in his footsteps. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Their Big Moment
programme.desc: Amusing yarn about two magicians hired to perform a fake seance. ZaSu Pitts. Bill: Slim Summerville. La Salle: William Gaxton. Lane: Bruce Cabot. Eve: Kay Johnson. Fay: Julie Haydon. Dr. Portman: Ralph Morgan. James Cruze directed.(n)

programme.title: Stingaree
programme.desc: Adventure-romance about a turn-of-the-century Australian bandit who helps a girl win operatic fame. Richard Dix, Irene Dunne. Mrs. Clarkson: Mary Boland. Clarkson: Henry Stephenson. Howie: Andy Devine. Kent: Conway Tearle. Annie: Una O'Conner. Fine cast, lovely music, handsome production. William A. Wellman directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Murder in the Clouds
programme.desc: Two ace pilots become involved with murder. Lyle Talbot, Ann Dvorak, Gordon Wescott, Robert Light, George Cooper, Charles Wilson. D. Ross Lederman directed.(n)

programme.title: Love on a Bet
programme.desc: Romp about a young man on a cross-country trip, made entertaining by a sparkling cast. Gene Raymond. Paula: Wendy Barrie. Aunt Charlotte: Helen Broderick. Uncle Carlton: William Collier Sr. Stephan: Walter Johnson. Good fun. Directed by Leigh Jason. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Living on Love
programme.desc: A man and woman share an apartment without meeting; one uses it at night, the other during the day because of their jobs. As they grate on each other's nerves, they play ambitious practical jokes on one another. Based on a novel by John K. Wells. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Kid Comes Back
programme.desc: Tale of a veteran fighter (Barton MacLane) who grooms a young man (Wayne Morris) as his opponent for the crown. June Travis. Bobby: Dickie Jones. Stan: Maxie Rosenbloom. Ken: James Robbins. Danny: Joseph Crehan. (cc).(n)

programme.title: They All Come Out
programme.desc: A youth (Tom Neal) who has drifted into crime is aided by prison rehabilitation. Interesting criminal yarn using documentary techniques. Kitty: Rita Johnson. Reno: Bernard Nedell. Joe: George Tobias. Bugs: Edward Gargan. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Alert Today---Alive Tomorrow
programme.desc: Public-service short demonstrates the city of Reading, Pa.,'s preparedness for nuclear attack, and examines a civil-defense program that would go into effect and rally volunteers for deployment to makeshift hospitals, and auxiliary police officers to help maintain order. Narrated by Andre Baruch.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Man
programme.desc: A man gradually withers away after being exposed to a mist consisting of an insecticide and radiation. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Them!
programme.desc: Atomic-bomb testing spawns an army of giant mutant ants that march through the storm drains of Los Angeles. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Magnetic Monster
programme.desc: Scientists attempt to destroy a dangerous radioactive substance. Richard Carlson, Jean Byron, Leo Britt. Forbes: King Donovan. Curt Siodmak directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Die, Monster, Die!
programme.desc: An old house harbors a bizarre secret. Boris Karloff, Nick Adams, Suzan Farmer. Letitia: Freda Jackson. Merwyn: Terence de Marney. Dr. Henderson: Patrick Magee. Directed by Daniel Haller. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Giant Behemoth
programme.desc: A radioactive sea monster terrorizes the English coast and rampages its way to London. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The H-Man
programme.desc: Victims of bomb tests are transformed into beings that live on humans. Yumi Shirakawa, Kenji Sahara, Akihiko Hirata. Not as bad as it sounds. Directed by Inoshiro Honda. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Phantom from 10,000 Leagues
programme.desc: An undersea monster commits murders. Kent Taylor. Lois: Cathy Downs. King: Michael Whalen. Dan Milner directed.(n)

programme.title: MGM Preview of Hits 1964
programme.desc: Studio film releases for 1964 are examined. Included: "Of Human Bondage," "Viva Las Vegas" and "The Unsinkable Molly Brown." Also: "Seven Faces of Dr. Lao," "The Americanization of Emily" and "Rhino!(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow the World!
programme.desc: Story of an American couple (Fredric March, Betty Field) who adopt a Nazi-indoctrinated German boy (Skippy Homeier). Agnes Moorehead, Joan Carroll. Excellent performances. Leslie Fenton directed.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in Heaven
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee tells the story of a minister and his family, and their joys and sorrows as they move from parish to parish over the years during the early 20th century. The film is an adaptation of Hartzell Spence's biography of his preacher father. (cc).(n)

programme.title: There Goes My Heart
programme.desc: A reporter (Fredric March) tracing a runaway rich girl (Virginia Bruce) finds her---working in her own department store. Eugene Pallette, Patsy Kelly, Nancy Carroll, Alan Mowbray, Claude Gillingwater, Arthur Lake, Harry Langdon. Norman Z. McLeod directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Mary of Scotland
programme.desc: John Ford's account of 16th-century court intrigue and politics involving Mary Stuart, Queen of Scotland, and the rivalry with her British cousin, Elizabeth Tudor, for the English throne. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Susan and God
programme.desc: A study of a shallow society woman who inflicts her superficial religious beliefs on family and friends. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Romance of Radium
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated "Pete Smith Specialty" short relating the story of the discovery of radium and its medical importance. Also: how difficult the element is to obtain. Directed by Jacques Tourneur.(n)

programme.title: Nothing Sacred
programme.desc: A woman feigns an incurable illness to get an all-expenses-paid fling to New York City, where she becomes the toast of the town. Meanwhile, the reporter who facilitated the trip tries to keep the ruse from the public. (cc).(n)

programme.title: So You Want to Hold Your Wife
programme.desc: Joe McDoakes (George O'Hanlon) deals with marital problems in this comedy short. Directed by Richard Bare.(n)

programme.title: I Married a Witch
programme.desc: The spirit of a 17th century sorceress rematerializes in 1942 New England and falls head over heels in love with a young, handsome politician. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Wagon Master
programme.desc: A Mormon wagon train headed for Utah to seek greener pastures meets up with two horse traders, who agree to help them navigate through the harsh and lawless countryside as they push their way west. (cc).(n)

programme.title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
programme.desc: In the second installment of John Ford's cavalry trilogy, an aging captain about to retire is given one last mission: check the growing alliance of belligerent Native American tribes, while squiring his commanding officer's headstrong wife and flirtatious niece to a rendezvous with an eastbound stagecoach. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Chisum
programme.desc: A New Mexico cattle baron and a ranch foreman battle over land with a greedy rival during the Lincoln County War in the 1870s. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)
